meanings.definition: Resembling velvet in texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The cat's fur was velvetlike to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The velvetlike petals of the flower felt soft against her skin.
meanings.sent3: The velvetlike cake icing was so smooth that it looked almost fake.
meanings.sent4: The velvetlike sky at dusk painted the horizon in rich hues.
meanings.sent5: The velvetlike fabric draped elegantly over the chair, inviting guests to sit and relax.

meanings.definition: Having a soft, smooth, and luxurious feel similar to velvet.
meanings.sent1: Her velvetlike scarf kept her warm on the chilly evening.
meanings.sent2: The velvetlike touch of the blanket made it perfect for snuggling.
meanings.sent3: The velvetlike lotion made her hands feel like royalty.
meanings.sent4: The velvetlike voice of the singer captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The velvetlike texture of the pudding melted in her mouth, leaving a rich flavor behind.
